text: Hagi ana knarera Gogima asentesaza matira Israeli mopafi amigahue. Hagi ana mopama amisuana, fri hagerimofo zage hanati kaziga kama nevaza agupo mopa zami'nuge'za, Gogine ana maka sondia vahe'a ana agupofi asezmantesageno, kama nevaza kana rehiza hugahie. E'ina hanige'za ana agupogura Hamon-gogie hu'za agia ahegahaze.
